claim_card.claim: The proposed signature is a histogram of ratios of consecutive NT distances; clustering indicates repeated physics.
claim_card.test_hook: Compute NT distances d_i and ratios r_i=d_i/d_{i+1}; check whether histogram exhibits stable clusters.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: we compute their distances d_i and form ratios r_i = d_i / d_{i+1}
